Clear Sky

During the first edition of Loupe, I build my first prototype with Framer X. This was for me the opportunity to dust off my front-end skills, with the introduction of React in Framer.

Stories

The prototype is a simple app showing the chances of precipitation in the next hours. It uses geolocalisation to get the position of the user and Dark Sky for the weather predictions.

Instagram for iPad
